title: Herbert Michael
text:
Herbert Donovan Michael (13 August 1890 – 27 April 1956) was an Australian politician who represented the <a href="South%20Australian%20House%20of%20Assembly">South Australian House of Assembly</a> seat of <a href="Electoral%20district%20of%20Light">Light</a> from 1939 to 1941 and 1944 to 1956 for the <a href="Liberal%20and%20Country%20League">Liberal and Country League</a>.
He was previously the chairman of the <a href="District%20Council%20of%20Eudunda">District Council of Eudunda</a> from 1933 to 1941.
Michael attended Kyre College, the predecessor to <a href="Scotch%20College%2C%20Adelaide">Scotch College, Adelaide</a>.
